title: Rotating Game Modes
body: Hello Everyone, Why does riot keep doing these game modes in rotation that promote skins ? i don't play much ranked and I love the weekend rotating game modes, I feel as of lately they're trying to bore the hell out of me like URF was fun for many people but personally I don't like it much, But would love to know when any of the game modes i found most fun will be rotating again as it has been a long time since I've seen a One for All, Hexakill or Legend of the Poro King in rotation, Or even nemesis draft where you could pick the enemies champions for them and they pick yours like how fun was that having to permaban Bard & Soraka hoping that you wont get them XD. Just wondering if anyone knows when any of these game modes will be back out or even if they enjoyed playing them and would like to see them around again ?

replies.body: I agree. The fact that you can only play them for 8 days over the span of 2 weeks after 11AM each day, and then wait who knows how long till another one comes on awes me. Riot please cater to those who only play rotating game modes and ARAM....

I mean, if your into the Rotating Game Mode, your just shit out of luck for anything good.

Riot has got in the habit of doing the good ones once in a blue moon, and the shitty ones (Ascension being a major one) constantly.
